titleStmt.title: The iudgement of the Godly and learned father M. Henry Bullinger chiefe preacher and pastor of the Church of Zurich in Swicerlande, declaring it to be lawfull for the ministers of the Churche of Englande, to weare the apparell prescribed by the lawes and orders of the same realme.
titleStmt.author: Bullinger, Heinrich, 1504-1575.

publicationStmt.publisher: By William Seres, dwelling in Paules Church yarde, at the signe of the hedgehogge,

notesStmt.note: In two parts; 2nd part has separate register.
Part 2 has caption title: Reuerendis in Christo patribus D. Roberto Horno Winton .. .
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Paules Church yarde, at the signe of the hedgehogge
